modules.title: Introduction to Soft Skills
modules.description: An introduction to soft skills and their importance for software developers in professional settings.
points: Why soft skills matter for developers
Overview of key soft skills for success

modules.title: Effective Communication
modules.description: Learn how to communicate clearly and effectively with team members, stakeholders, and clients.

modules.title: Team Collaboration
modules.description: Covers strategies for working effectively in teams to enhance productivity and project success.

modules.title: Time Management and Productivity
modules.description: Explores techniques for managing time, prioritizing tasks, and staying productive as a developer.
points: Prioritizing tasks with frameworks like Eisenhower Matrix

modules.title: Problem-Solving and Critical Thinking
modules.description: Learn how to approach problems systematically and think critically to find effective solutions.

modules.title: Adaptability and Learning Agility
modules.description: Covers how to stay adaptable and continuously learn in the fast-evolving tech industry.

modules.title: Emotional Intelligence
modules.description: Explains emotional intelligence and its role in building relationships and managing stress.

modules.title: Giving and Receiving Feedback
modules.description: Learn how to provide constructive feedback and handle feedback effectively in a professional setting.

modules.title: Networking and Relationship Building
modules.description: Covers strategies for building professional relationships and networking in the tech industry.
points: Leveraging communities like GitHub and LinkedIn

modules.title: Leadership and Initiative
modules.description: Explores how developers can demonstrate leadership and take initiative in their roles.

questions.question: What is a key component of effective communication for developers?
Which framework helps prioritize tasks based on urgency and importance?
What is the purpose of emotional intelligence in a workplace?
What is a benefit of giving constructive feedback?
